3.text: Chop the kiwifruit in half, across the widest part.

4.text: Cut the kiwifruit into circular slices.

5.text: Cut the ends off the kiwifruit.

6.text: Insert a spoon between the skin and flesh of the kiwifruit.

7.text: Rotate the spoon around the kiwifruit, beneath the skin.

8.text: Pop the fruit from the skin.

9.text: Slice the kiwifruit vertically in half.
